title: Smith Brothers 780 Power Reclining Chair | Sprintz Furniture | Recliner - Three Way
text: Where Can I See This Product in Store? This product is not on display in our showrooms. Estimated Delivery Price Enter your zip code to get a delivery estimate. Dimensions Width (side to side): 39" W Depth (front to back): 41" D Height (bottom to top): 44" H Seat Width: 23" Seat Depth: 19" Seat Height: 21" Arm Height: 26" Length Fully Reclined: 73" Distance Required to Recline: 5" remove Description Add comfort and classic style to your living space with this Motorized Reclining Chair. The piece boasts a generously cushioned bustle back for a comfortable sit and look, while the rolled arms with nail head trim running down the front adds that traditional touch. Relax with the smooth, motorized reclining functionality, operated by the simple two-button control on the side. Furthermore, this piece is available in a wide variety of fabric and leather, nailhead and leg finish options to create a look that suits your style best. The 780 Power Reclining Chair, made by Smith Brothers, is brought to you by Sprintz Furniture. Sprintz Furniture is a local furniture store, serving the Nashville, Franklin, and Greater Tennessee area. Product availability may vary.
